attr.title: BAD END THEATER
attr.desc:
Bad End Theater is a charmingly cruel little story game where everything goes wrong and thatâ€™s exactly the point.
You guide a cast of cute-but-doomed characters through branching paths, knowing full well that every choice leads to another terrible ending. The fun comes from experimenting: change one role, replay the story, and watch how fate twists in new, often darkly funny ways.
attr.inst: Either buy the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1764390/BAD_END_THEATER or GOG  https://www.gog.com/de/game/bad_end_theater and copy the "game" folder into the ports "badendtheater" folder
attr.inst_md: Either buy the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1764390/BAD_END_THEATER) or [GOG](https://www.gog.com/de/game/bad_end_theater)  and copy the "game" folder into the ports
